t = int(raw_input().strip())

for _ in xrange(t):
    n = int(raw_input().strip())
    pies = map(int, raw_input().strip().split())
    racks = map(int, raw_input().strip().split())

    pies.sort()
    racks.sort()

    last_pie = n
    tot_pies = 0

    for rack in reversed(racks):
        for i, pie in reversed(list(enumerate(pies[0:last_pie]))):
            if pie <= rack:
                tot_pies += 1
                last_pie = i
                break

    print tot_pies
